Text:
this is the north and south, that takes place in mid 1800's england.  the original story by elizabeth gaskell, a writer who took english society to task for it's treatment of the poor.  

this is a 9.0 on the imdb and is a marvelous movie and a not too bad script based on the book.
Thanks to the uploader and to mrKnightley for his insightful comentary.

Thank you for this! A great series it was, i just watched it. The industrial history and the class relations were maybe the most interesting things for me, even if whole the story was really good. 

The subtitles didn't work for me though, fortunately i understood pretty much everything without them as well. Whether it was my fault or the torent's fault, i don't know.
Thank you so much for this wonderful series.
Heard a lot about this. the wife'll be chuffed. Thanks
thanks alot jgorden really appreciate your time and effort well done excellent keep up the good work
@ArnoldKW there are lots of films or serialised books similar to this one - have a look at Shakespeare Retold (The Taming of the Shrew); Wide Sargasso Sea; Byron to name a few.
and Sparkhouse....not sure if all are available on PB, but you might find them somewhere else online.

Here's the Soundtrack:
http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/7208013

Download and have fun...
